articles.title: Micah Parsons will be first Packer to wear No. 1 since Curly Lambeau - NBC Sports
articles.description: Micah Parsons wore No. 11 at Penn State, where he became a consensus All-American.
articles.content:
Micah Parsons wore No. 11 at Penn State, where he became a consensus All-American. He wore No. 11 with the Cowboys, where he made 52.5 sacks in four seasons.
Wide receiver Jayden Reed already had No… [+470 chars]

articles.title: ‘It’s Sad, But It’s Also a Celebration’: Lee Corso, College Football’s Soul, Signs Off - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The ‘GameDay’ icon became America’s grandpa through his passion for the sport and connection to fans across the country.
